value:
I once used the expression "hop to it,"
and everyone laughed. Do you think
someone here could explain why?

Humans drove my species to the
brink of extinction. Because of this,
I believed none could be trusted.$k$pBut that changed when I met the
exalt Emmeryn...

I hear you have no fighting prowess
of your own.$k$pIf you encounter trouble on the
battlefield, should I carry you to
safety?

Tell me, can that divine weapon of
yours summon food in the same
manner it summons Heroes?$k$pPerhaps you could try summoning
me some carrots.

I've been observing the other Heroes.
Races from different worlds all exist
peacefully together here...$k$pWere taguel and humans once like
this as well?

Are you $Nu?
Greetings from
$Nf.$k$pYou're both of the same species, so
you two should continue to remain
friends.
My strength is that of all taguel!

Having this much strength gives
me peace of mind.

I suppose this will lead to what
they call "natural selection."

You're giving me this power? You
are very kind for a human.

My name is Panne. I'm the last of the
taguel. You appear to be human... But
are you one worthy of my trust?

Ah, I thought you might be heading
this way. I've come to recognize the
sound of your footsteps.$k$pWhat would you like to chat about
today? I could tell you about the exalt
Emmeryn if you'd like.$k$pOr perhaps the history of the taguel?
Although, that is not the cheeriest of
subjects to discuss.$k$pWhy not tell me about yourself?
I know the sound of your footsteps,
but I have not memorized your voice.$k$pYou're surprisingly quiet for a human,
so I end up doing most of the talking.
But in truth, I'm a better listener.$k$pNo need to look embarrassed. I'll
listen to any topic you wish to speak
on. It'll only help us grow closer.
はっ！
たあっ！
ううっ！
Stop.
The taguel do not play!
I smell your fear.
I cannot die here.
Nice try. My turn.
Good-bye...
Heehee
Did you have need of me?
I can change shape into a rabbit. That's what a taguel is.
Taguel have excellent hearing. I won't miss your orders.
You seem intent on petting me. Should I change into my rabbit form?
It seems the Order of Heroes draws many different types of people... And yet, they all work together.
I have an intense craving for carrots...
I'm glad to be of use. On my honor as a taguel, I won't disappoint on the battlefield.
Yes?
I hear you.
Orders?
